title: Developing Godly Patience
itunes:author: Guest: Jodie Berndt
itunes:summary:
Many times in the Bible, we're commanded to wait on the Lord. Yet, applying that principle to your parenting is not an easy thing. John and Danny discuss how Scripture can be a great encouragement during a season of waiting on God. Featuring Jodie Berndt.

Find us online at focusonthefamily.com/parentingpodcast, or call 1-800-A-FAMILY.

Receive Jodie Berndt's book "Praying the Scriptures for your Children" for your donation of any amount:
https://donate.focusonthefamily.com/don-fofp-podcast-2022-05-17?refcd=1410904

Get more episode resources: https://www.focusonthefamily.com/episodes/focus-on-parenting-podcast/developing-godly-patience/#featured-resource-cta

Listen Anytime: https://store.focusonthefamily.com/praying-scripture-over-your-child-s-life-digital/?refcd=1423601

If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: https://focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey/
